 */export var SHOW_NOTIFICATION='SHOW_NOTIFICATION';export var HIDE_NOTIFICATION='HIDE_NOTIFICATION';/**
 * Show notification (append to notification to global notification map).
 * @param  {String} msgType
 * @param  {String} msgText
 * @param  {any} msgDebug
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Notification/Action/showNotification
 */export var showNotification=middleware(function(msgType,msgText,msgDebug){return{type:SHOW_NOTIFICATION,msgType:msgType,msgText:msgText,msgDebug:msgDebug};},"Store/Notification/Action/showNotification\n");/**
 * Hide notification with specific id (drop notification from global list).
 * @param  {number} id
 * @return {void}
 * @namespace Store/Notification/Action/hideNotification
 */export var hideNotification=middleware(function(id){return{type:HIDE_NOTIFICATION,id:id};},"Store/Notification/Action/hideNotification\n");
